title: Them and us: a case study
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, Film Producers Guild, Terrick Fitzhugh and Peter K. Smith
brief_description: A large industrial firm is used as a case study to illstrate the need for cooperation and understanding of each other’s needs between management and the representatives of employee groups. Illustrates employee representation in management.
